titleStmt.title: A moste true and marueilous straunge wonder, the lyke hath seldom ben seene, of. XVII. monstrous fishes, taken in Suffolke, at Downham brydge, within a myle of Ipswiche The .XI. daye of October. in the yeare of our Lorde God. M.D.LX.VIII.
titleStmt.author: Granger, Timothy.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate, at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist
